name: Hot Pursuit
description:
Guide two dinosaur friends, John and Gilbert, to the escape from the deadly heat! 

One player plays as John, other as Gilbert. Gilbert is available as download.

Hot Pursuit consists of two separate games that you play on separate computers. Players should not see each others screens, but should communicate and work together to guide each other through the game. Players will see different things on their screens, and will have to combine the information.

You will only win if both of you reach the ending!

Made in the Assembly Game Jam at Assembly 2018 Computer Festival in Helsinki. Game Jam theme was "Hot hot hot".

Made with Bitsy
